name: Quick Ships
description:
Description

Quick Ships is a game I've been developing for years, it's great for chilling with friends and getting into intense firefights. Classic Mode offers countless levels and even bosses that each test your skill and put you into an intense bullet hell. Each controller plugged in allows for another controller, this allows for more and more people to team up. Work together and conquer space.

Features

Classic Mode: In this mode you play through all the levels in random order, collect power ups and use abilities to out smart and overpower wave after wave. Defeat enemies to gain charge and use it to unleash an unimaginable amount of power in a single attack. Play with friends and ease the strain of the intense bullet hell that is Quick Ships. Only the best player sets a high score, beat your friends even when working together. There is also a buffed mode which all you do to activate is press left on character selection, adds tons of lives at the cost of not being able to set a high score. Or totally destroy all logic within the game and use the keyboard exclusive infinite ship play style. Without a controller plugged in, amp up the players and watch as 1 person controls 100 or more.

Player vs. Player: Ever wanted to use specials on your friends and wipe them out like they were enemies? Now's your chance with the Player vs. Player mode Top vs. Bottom. In this mode players must choose between shooting up or shooting down at their friends. Plug in tons of controllers and see what happens when more and more players join in.
